website_summaries.verdict: This compact and lightweight unit is a portable option for those who enjoy the solitude of traveling or camping alone, or who carry lunch to the worksite.
pros: This model is durable enough to take the pounding of a construction site
Its biggest benefit, though, is its portability
It is spacious enough to hold a large lunch and two bottles of water or sports drinks, yet compact enough to travel in the passenger seat
cons: While the outer shell is durable, some users have reported this model's handle becoming detached after limited usage

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware 🍋!!️
customer_reviews.text: I believe I got,,, A LEMON 🍋😡!!️ Purchased this a few months back,, fits my needs perfectly! Unfortunately the lid will not stay on the base. It appears to me (Dir. Quality 15 yrs) this top should have been a reject, the plastic where the top sockets connects to the bottom pins has voids, and is extremely thin, almost paper thin! The top comes off every time I open it 😡!!️ Also can’t find a way to contact the seller? Did I overlook a link🤔? Purchased another sellers item as a replacement. This one went into the trash today.
customer_reviews.author: Jay F.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: For a small cooler as a lunch box, it fits the bill nice! Inside dimensions roomy enough to handle 2/12oz wtrs, a Kombucha, 14oz stnlss thermos, 2 reusable Ice pcks(1sm 1mdm), 1 sndwch, apple, 2 sncks, napkins, & supplies, cellphone, & that fills it full! Not much bigger than my other, but the couple of inches diff makes a big diff in how much standard sized stuff you can actually fit into it!
customer_reviews.author: electriczipper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for old cooler
customer_reviews.text: This 9qt Rubbermaid cooler is the exact replacement I've been looking for to replace my 32 year old Gott Model 1908. Not too surprising since Rubbermaid bought Gott many years ago. The interior dimensions are the exact size to handle my 6-pk Freezer pack and the soda cans with no slack or bouncing around.
customer_reviews.author: Mark_H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: We hunted for 2 years for an ice chest that would hold the 1 ltr. sport water bottles, because we freeze them and take them with us on trips.. this one does! Perfect! water will stay frozen for half the day, just long enough to use it up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Judish

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Perfect size to pack a bunch of drinks for a day at the beach. Also great if you work outside. It's big enough to hold several bottles of water and a packed lunch plus ice packs but isn't so big that it's a pain to lug around. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: It did a good job of keeping my lunch cold and was a ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is as described and has worked very well for me. It did a good job of keeping my lunch cold and was a good size, for me it was important that a bottle of Gatoade fit and that was true. I like that it is hard sided, I have wrecked a couple of soft sided lunchboxes in the past year due to how I transport them. I am hoping this will hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It’s rubbermaid
customer_reviews.text: It’s Rubbermaid!! What can I say you don’t already know? Husband works 13 hour shifts... perfect size for 2 snacks and a meal. Stands up to the abuse it gets from his job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and actually easy to open
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little cooler, and perfectly holds our sandwiches, fruit, snacks and drinks for a day outing. I don't usually write reviews but am writing this one because some folks in other reviews mentioned that it's hard to open. No, it's very easy, there's a trick to it. Don't just try to pull it open, but instead just put your fingers until the closure area in the middle and make like you are snapping them...bingo, open!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Organ

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Holds ice all day for my husband who works construction. Would be easier to clean if the outside was smooth, but a small brush will do the trick also.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super Handy Size
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking a meal to the field! Very nice little ice chest. Very easy to clean. STURDY!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Soukup

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but the lid comes right off a bit too easily which can be annoying. If I could give it 4.5 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: frequentbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift. It was a little smaller than I expected, so I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: John Lear

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: We had to send this back because we had such a hard time opening it. It is a good product except for that flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fiumara

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler
customer_reviews.text: I got drunk on the beach and lost my orginal cooler. I bought this as a replacement and it suffices.
customer_reviews.author: Marlisa Lim

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item less a year ago to replace a similar one that lasted 20 years for me, however the current item has not even lasted one year without the handle pulling out of the socket rendering it useless to carry. I have not been able to find any kind of warranty information from the seller so I'm at a loss as how to replace this.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been carrying a beat-up old cooler to work for longer than I can imagine. It was time to replace it. This one is perfect. Not too large, but easily holds soft drinks and a couple sandwiches for lunch. He was a little hesitant to replace his old cooler, but quickly realized this new one was a good idea. It arrived quickly and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: ooma

customer_reviews.title: Personal use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad since his old one over 10 years now broke down. Its a fantastic brand and very durable. He puts his sandwiches and drinks in. This is good for a personal lunch box including utensils for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Do

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size but it does not keep items as cold as the old Gott cooler of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Rick R Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size. My husband had to file ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. My husband had to file down a lip inside on the front where the lid was too tight. It worked and it is Rubbermaid. What can I add to that?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: I love this little cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cooler! I wanted something I could put in the back of my sit-on-top kayak and it fits perfectly! Great size for bringing on road trips as well. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a small cooler that would fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small cooler that would fit lunch for me and a friend while on a road trip. This was just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: jenc

customer_reviews.title: Great for this purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep a few beverages by my bed with an Icepavk for times I can't get up after surgery / due to pain. Great for this purpose
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Will not hold ice for more than a couple of hours, lid will not stay on, falls off every time its opened.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lunch Pail.
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these. Sturdy, bang around box holds my lunch, drinks and snakes. Only thing is the lid can come off which is a pain sometimes but, it is still the best cooler lunch box I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Kamyk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to take on a cruise. It was just the right size to slide under the lounge chair and have a place to store drinks.... Also nice to bring along while working outside without the need of a large cooler.
customer_reviews.author: andiru

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and I’m sure useful but didn’t come until long after the last hurricane . I hope I never have to use it anyway .
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Newmark

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a road trip to sit in front floorboard!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Replacing the smaller version I accidentally bought a few weeks before. It is of good construction and holds few drinks and plenty of food. Good insulating properties. Rubbermaid has been around for many years and still makes quality merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot for a small ice chest!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed! Great product for a small ice chest. I was replacing an old one that was the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Shastagirl

customer_reviews.title: Handy cooler.
customer_reviews.text: For bottled water and so forth. Sturdy and serves our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cooler but very difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cooler but very difficult to open. The last one I had had a ball end pin to hold it close and was much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: J D S

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Very durable cooler, easy to carry. The box shape is great for storing multiple coolers together. Other coolers are rounded (odd shapes) and don't pack/stack as compactly together. These have been perfect for transporting of our scientific samples.
customer_reviews.author: ENV-WQL

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, rugged, and fits my Corona bottles, albeit laying down.
customer_reviews.author: A. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good size for lunches
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find this in the stores and needed a replacement as the first one got dropped and the hinge broke. This is a great size for lunches or a day trip for two. Durable, just don't drop it!
customer_reviews.author: treecopswife

customer_reviews.title: The right size lunch cooler chest.
customer_reviews.text: I first got the Rubbermaid 5 quart cooler but once you put in the ice packs there is not much room for my lunch. I then got the 10 quart Rubbermaid cooler that was just the right size. I have room for the ice packs and my lunch and drinks. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Stone

customer_reviews.title: A littlle smaller thanI thought.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to replace an old cooler (30+ years old.) The other one was a Coleman, and is perfect for travel lunches and such. This one is 15% smaller and will probably work fine, but I wish it was just that tiny bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to have by the pool while we are swimming. Perfect size to hold extra water.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Cool cooler
customer_reviews.text: I take lunch and snacks and sometimes dinner too to work each day. Food stays cool and fresh. This was a replacement to one just like it which worked fine after several years but was looking old and scratched up. Buy it. You'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Lunch Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Rubbermaid ice chest. This one's lid is quite a bit thinner and not well insulated. It is a tad smaller on the inside, as well. Otherwise it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It does not insulate well and the lid hinges are ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not insulate well and the lid hinges are very flimsy and the lid had already came off several times......
customer_reviews.author: Darrell F

customer_reviews.title: hinge system broke, its very cheap. I put ...
customer_reviews.text: hinge system broke, its very cheap. I put a steel pin through and it works now. Also, dont try and sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenessa Galmut

customer_reviews.title: Nice light yet strong
customer_reviews.text: As far as cooler goes, you can't go wrong with rubbermaid. Nice light yet strong. It does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly as You'd Expect
customer_reviews.text: Used it right away! Holds 8 cans standing up on the bottom and 4 cans laying on top of them and it looks tall enough to hold a 6-pack of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good size but has swishing water sound in top/lid
customer_reviews.text: Convenient volume for the water bottles and food containers that we usually want to put into it. The outer shape is good for the backseat or the "trunk" of our vehicle. Lid closure is good and secure (yes, opening the cooler is does require a little extra effort.) The only aspect that I don't like is that sound of liquid in the lid/top that I can't seem to get rid off (I bought two of these coolers: one came with the liquid sound; the other acquired the sound after being washed) -- this is the reason why only 4-stars is awarded.
customer_reviews.author: D. Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot days
customer_reviews.text: Got this cooler for my son. He keeps in his car for when ever he needs. He is in the Air Force so he never know when he is going to be called on to work. This way he always has some thing cool and fresh while working. It is hot where he is stationed so this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne C. Christmas

customer_reviews.title: The lid locks shut very firmly, hard to open ...
customer_reviews.text: The lid locks shut very firmly, hard to open. I had to trim off a little of the plastic to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Colin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great ice chest
customer_reviews.text: This ice chest is just the right size to take on trips for items inside vehicle or for lunches keeps everything cold recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Segura

customer_reviews.title: works well!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great! I kinda needed one so I bought one. And i am happy I did. Buy it! Keeps ur drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Vasilchuk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lunchbox, fits everything that is necessary, including a big thermos.
customer_reviews.author: Iris and Greg

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid cooler
customer_reviews.text: Returned not for the quality but for the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Fits more than a sandwich
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly for what I wanted! The inside is easy to clean and the outside is durable. BIG with lots of room!
customer_reviews.author: CharbySue

customer_reviews.title: it will get better over time
customer_reviews.text: The lid is very hard to open. Hopefully, it will get better over time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Advertised dimensions are 14. 5 x 11 x 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertised dimensions are 14.5 x 11 x 10. Actual dimensions are 12 x 11 x 10. Not the size I was looking for at all!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the size and it came in the color I wanted. The local stores have them in red for a few dollars more. Lots of space for a large lunch. Lid locks in place but sometimes it requires a little extra force to open. But then again, you don't have to worry about your food and drink spilling out in the event you drop or knock it over.
customer_reviews.author: Wobbles

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size Lunch Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cooler to replace my old playmate lunch cooler. Initially I thought it looked small but was suprised to find out it will actually hold a lot! Four 12 oz cans will lay flat side to side in the bottom. The interior measures about 6" wide by 10" long by about 8 1/2" tall. I also ordered two of the 7" by 6.75" blue ice to use in the cooler and was disappointed to find that they are too large to lay flat in the cooler. I look forward to many years of service from this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my husband's lunch box. He is in construction and he needs something that is tough and breakproof. When it gets dirty, it is easy to clean. Fits a sandwich, fruit, snacks and a couple of water bottles. In the summer he puts an ice pack in it to keep everything cool.
customer_reviews.author: kek818

customer_reviews.title: This was a great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I was expecting (on the outside), but was the only one in its class that had enough room for my hot lunches that I keep in microwave containers... all the others were too small on the inside. This was a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Mahler

customer_reviews.title: boyfriend lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've purchased for my boyfriend, they are great size and perfect for a construction workers to use, but the lid ends up breaking off of all of them, they need to revise this and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised - just the right size for "Meals on Wheels" recipient.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Sjolund

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and keeps things cool
customer_reviews.text: Use this everyday to take my lunch to work. It is a solid product, and the insulation is great. Keeps my food cool for the entire day, no need to take the food out and put it in the work refrigerator. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: emperor of icecream

customer_reviews.title: Fits half gallon of milk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for bringing milk and snacks for kids on car trips. Love that it's small enough to keep in the back seat and reach around to grab from the front seat, but still big enough to hold 12 cans. It holds a half gallon of milk upright, as long as you fold down the top a little.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bluth

customer_reviews.title: Tough and spacey.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for another Rubbermaid lunchbox for a while. My old one was just to small and nobody carried these around my area.Plenty of space to hold all my lunch and as for the lid being tough to open; I like it to not fall open if I was to happen to drop it or it get knocked off.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied buyer

customer_reviews.title: this cooler arrived today and I am happy to report that my Corona bottles (9
customer_reviews.text: I've had no luck finding a 6-pack-ish-size cooler that will fit a 6-pack of CORONA bottles standing up or laying down. However, this cooler arrived today and I am happy to report that my Corona bottles (9.5 inches tall) fit perfectly laying down, with plenty of room for ice. It does open hard, as others have reported.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Cooler-10qt
customer_reviews.text: Daily work lunchbox. A little roomier than my coleman that disappeared. Not convinced that it keeps things cool all day, compared to my coleman. Probably need a larger icepack. I do like this size to pack a better lunch.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this small cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good cooler. Some folks erroneously say that the lid will get easier to open. No it won't. And I am glad. If you look carefully there is a built in kind of latch for the lid that makes it purposely tight so that it doesn't just flop open.
customer_reviews.author: Oriental Medicine Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I work in my car and in the summer I need to keep my food and drinks cold. However, this cooler doesn't keep things cold that long and it is very difficult to open with two hands and impossible to open with one hand. It is not a good cooler for using in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a cooler and it does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and husband have one of these to take their lunches to work and they both love them. They aren't rough on them, so I can't attest to the durability, but they do keep their food/drinks cold (with added ice packs) and serve their purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The item was a little expensive when I compared prices but it works for work.. It keeps the drinks nice and cool with the ice
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for one short trip so far, but will be using it when I travel as well as grocery shop. It should do nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nina F.

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch cooler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend who works in construction. I easily fits a sandwich, a few cans/small bottles, some snacks, and an ice pack. It looks like its been through hell at the end of the day, but washes clean with some soap and water. Great quality and keeps food nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: As we expected, we use it store fomula for the baby, We put three ice bag, and one lagre bottle of fomula. it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Wang

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find this size cooler in the stores this year. It's tall enough to stand bottles of water upright and big enough for 3 bottles of water, 2 pounds of carrots, 2 apples (for our horses) and a large icee to keep everything cold. Best part is that when I use ice and it eventually melts, lid stays tightly closed if cooler tips over in car, so water stays in the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: LONNY BLACKBURN

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My delivery was on time, not damaged and the price was decent. The cooler was exactly what I was looking for. I would order from this person again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lackner

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good cooler, but it was smaller than what I really needed so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonRN

customer_reviews.title: ... personal cooler in the pass this is one is best one as far size which is on small side ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase lots of personal cooler in the pass this is one is best one as far size which is on small side but not big enough to for me to have to meals and 2 cans of soda. And you can use it as a seat it hold my weight with out of problem 190lb.
customer_reviews.author: Alpaslan Aydin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size is good but you can't get the top open without a struggle. Talk about a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: BOB/SUSAN P

customer_reviews.title: works for me!
customer_reviews.text: great! this was to replace an older one. little tight on the lid but that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Boat Ride companion rubbermaid cooler
customer_reviews.text: just what I wanted it for, perfect size,recieved in quick time. Good quality and rugged. Good Trinidad Carnival partner. Trini Chick.
customer_reviews.author: Trini chick

customer_reviews.title: Strong! Holds all the food and beverages my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong! Holds all the food and beverages my husband needs for two days on the road as a truck driver.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Libassi

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid 10-Quart Personal Ice Chest Cooler, Blue
customer_reviews.text: My cooler handle broke after years of service and I was unable to find a replacement at local store. I checked Amazon and what you know that had it. Cooler arrived in 3 days. I am very happy with the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for cans (maybe 3 or 4) and bottles (maybe 1 or 2) to go in altogether!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Loh

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. 2
customer_reviews.text: The lid was extremely difficult to open. I would not buy this again. very disappointed. 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and color
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my husband to carry his lunch to work and it is also more pleasing to the eye than the red ones that you normally see.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it would be. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J

customer_reviews.title: nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cooler, 4 stars because the cooler does not set flat, and very slippery bottom, but most coolers are the same, I would reccomend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: paul russo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lid disconnected in the first week. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Taylor-Manges

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and it keeps my food and beverages ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me, I love the color and it keeps my food and beverages nice and cool and it's very secure.
customer_reviews.author: cesar salomon

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch box : D I bought this for my husband because his old lunch box was to old and dirty
customer_reviews.author: Veronique Riddle

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Cooler, 10 Quart, Blue FG2A1104MODBL
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Size:10-quartRubbermaid Cooler / Ice Chest, 10-quart, Blue (FG2A1104MODBL). Superior thermal retention keeps food and beverages cold. Top swing handle makes the small cooler easy to carry. Stain and odor resistant. Holds 12 cans plus ice. Easy-to-clean liner. Made in the USA for nearly 80 years, Rubbermaid has represented innovative, high-quality products that help simplify life. Recognized as a “Brand of the Century” for its impact on the American way of life.
feature_bullets: Superior thermal retention keeps food and beverages cold.
Top swing handle makes the small cooler easy to carry.
Easy-to-clean liner. Made in the USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars238 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
